North_Las_Vegas.Cowtown Guitars: Cowtown Guitars is a vintage guitar shop located in Las Vegas, Nevada, owned by husband and wife, Jesse and Roxie Amoroso. The shop is well known for having one of the largest collection of vintage guitars in North America and boasts a client list of celebrities, which includes Carlos Santana and Imagine Dragons. Owner Jesse Amoroso has appeared several times as the vintage guitar expert on the History Channel's hit reality television series Pawn Stars.
